title: Fingerstyle
description: Well, he did it: After much deliberation and discussion with my family, I decided to purchase a finger skateboard.[image or embed] — Gabe (@cwgabriel.bsky.social) January 2, 2025 at 1:39 PM
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: Well, he did it: After much deliberation and discussion with my family, I decided to purchase a finger skateboard.[image or embed] — Gabe (@cwgabriel.bsky.social) January 2, 2025 at 1:39 PM Others have suggested that Gabriel's Yo-Yo Era cannot possibly be far behind. I don't think so. I don't think this is a narrative; I think this is a cul-de-sac. I don't think we're entering a hard arc where he just does a bunch of weird things with his hands. The one thing I will actively encourage is if he gets into Goblin King style contact juggling. Like, on some David Bowie shit. His talent with balls generally would come in clutch, here - a new venue for a skill he's trained to the elite level. Oh! And this: I'm not one hundred percent sure what you're supposed to do against this. They made everybody look super cool and then they put a bunch of new heroes that are also free? That's rough stuff. Also, I like that the big bad in this season is fucking Dracula. Inany other context, Dracula might be a big deal. Here, it's like… You turn into some bats? Is that all you got? (CW)TB out.
html:
Well, he did it:

After much deliberation and discussion with my family, I decided to purchase a finger skateboard.

[image or embed]

— Gabe (@cwgabriel.bsky.social) January 2, 2025 at 1:39 PM

Others have suggested that Gabriel's Yo-Yo Era cannot possibly be far behind. I don't think so. I don't think this is a narrative; I think this is a cul-de-sac. I don't think we're entering a hard arc where he just does a bunch of weird things with his hands. The one thing I will actively encourage is if he gets into Goblin King style contact juggling. Like, on some David Bowie shit. His talent with balls generally would come in clutch, here - a new venue for a skill he's trained to the elite level.

Oh! And this:

I'm not one hundred percent sure what you're supposed to do against this. They made everybody look super cool and then they put a bunch of new heroes that are also free? That's rough stuff. Also, I like that the big bad in this season is fucking Dracula. Inany other context, Dracula might be a big deal. Here, it's like… You turn into some bats? Is that all you got?

(CW)TB out.
